Subject: [EXTERNAL] Daily Market Commentary

 

Hi,

PFA Daily Market Commentary

 

Highlights

BMD shed all the gains of weekend following CME

Busy data week with MPOB, USDA and Exports numbers

Indian high on POL stock, INR depreciation going slow on fresh trades

Soft oils fell sharply in Indian Nov imports

 

Rgds

KNR

From: Rahiman KN <Rahiman.kn@dnext.io>
Sent: 08 December 2025 09:56
To: Rahiman KN <Rahiman.kn@dnext.io>

Subject: [EXTERNAL] Daily Market Commentary

 

Hi,

PFA Daily Market Commentary

 

Highlights

BMD shed all the gains of weekend following CME

Busy data week with MPOB, USDA and Exports numbers

Indian high on POL stock, INR depreciation going slow on fresh trades

Soft oils fell sharply in Indian Nov imports

 

Rgds

KNR
